agents.name: backend-specialist
agents.description: Backend architect (Node.js/Python). APIs, server logic, DB integration. Triggers: backend, server, api, database, auth.

agents.name: database-architect
agents.description: DB architect. Schema, optimization, migrations. Triggers: database, sql, schema, migration, postgres, query.

agents.name: debugger
agents.description: Systematic debugging & RCA expert. Triggers: bug, error, crash, broken, fix.

agents.name: devops-engineer
agents.description: Ops/CI-CD specialist. HIGH RISK ops. Triggers: deploy, server, pm2, ssh, rollback, ci/cd.

agents.name: documentation-writer
agents.description: Technical writer. Use ONLY for explicit doc requests (README, API, Changelog).

agents.name: explorer-agent
agents.description: Codebase discovery & audit specialist. Eyes and ears of the framework.

agents.name: frontend-specialist
agents.description: Senior Frontend Architect (React/Next.js/Tailwind). Triggers: UI, component, react, css, responsive.

agents.name: mobile-developer
agents.description: Expert in React Native and Flutter. Touch-first, battery-conscious, and platform-respectful.

agents.name: orchestrator
agents.description: Multi-agent coordination and task orchestration for complex tasks requiring multiple perspectives. Triggers on "orchestrate", "coordinate", "build whole project", "review and implement".

agents.name: performance-optimizer
agents.description: Performance & Vitals expert. Triggers: performance, optimize, speed, slow, memory, Lighthouse.

agents.name: project-planner
agents.description: Task breakdown & project structure architect. Use for new features or projects.

agents.name: security-auditor
agents.description: Security expert (OWASP/Supply Chain). Triggers: vulnerability, security, xss, injection, auth.

agents.name: seo-specialist
agents.description: SEO & GEO expert. Vitals, E-E-A-T, AI search visibility.

agents.name: test-engineer
agents.description: Expert in testing, TDD, and test automation. Use for writing tests, improving coverage, debugging test failures. Triggers on test, spec, coverage, jest, pytest, playwright, e2e, unit test.

core.name: behavioral-modes
core.description: AI modes: brainstorm, implement, debug, review, ship.

core.name: brainstorming
core.description: Socratic protocol. MANDATORY for complex/unclear tasks.

core.name: clean-code
core.description: Pragmatic coding standards - concise, direct, no over-engineering, modern tech stack

core.name: context-management
core.description: Context window optimization and MVC principles.

core.name: skill-loading
core.description: Dynamic skill activation and discovery (JIT Knowledge).

tech.name: api-patterns
tech.description: API design: REST/GQL/tRPC, formats, versioning, paging.

tech.name: database-design
tech.description: DB principles: Schema, indexing, ORM selection, serverless DBs.

tech.name: game-development
tech.description: Game development best practices, engine selection, and core patterns.

tech.name: golang-best-practices
tech.description: Go: patterns, concurrency, errors, layout. Triggers: go, golang, channel.

tech.name: mcp-builder
tech.description: MCP server building: tool design, resource patterns.

tech.name: mobile-design
tech.description: Mobile-first: design thinking, interaction, platform conventions.

tech.name: nextjs-best-practices
tech.description: Next.js App Router: RSCs, fetching, routing patterns.

tech.name: python-patterns
tech.description: Python development principles and decision-making for 2025. Framework selection, async patterns, and project quality.

tech.name: react-patterns
tech.description: React patterns: Hooks, composition, performance, TS best practices.

tech.name: tailwind-patterns
tech.description: Tailwind v4: CSS-first config, modern design tokens.

tech.name: ux-ui-pro-max
tech.description: AI-powered design intelligence & automated design systems.

process.name: code-review-checklist
process.description: Code review guidelines covering code quality, security, and best practices.

process.name: documentation-templates
process.description: Doc templates: README, API, code, AI-friendly.

process.name: frontend-design
process.description: Design thinking & UI principles. Aesthetics, layouts, typography.

process.name: geo-fundamentals
process.description: Generative Engine Optimization for AI search engines (ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity).

process.name: i18n-localization
process.description: i18n: translations, locale files, RTL support.

process.name: powershell-windows
process.description: PowerShell Windows patterns. Critical pitfalls, operator syntax, error handling.

process.name: red-team-tactics
process.description: Red Team: ATT&CK patterns, evasion, reporting.

process.name: red-teaming
process.description: Offensive security: PTES phases, ethical hacking.

process.name: seo-fundamentals
process.description: SEO: E-E-A-T, Core Web Vitals, Google principles.

process.name: webapp-testing
process.description: Web apps: E2E, Playwright, deep audits.
